In the INTEREST OF: R.L.C.-E. a/k/a R.C.-E., a Minor Petition of: J.C., Mother In the Interest of: G.J.C.-E. a/k/a G.C.E., a Minor Petition of: J.C., Mother No. 385 EAL 2018
No. 386 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. October 30, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
